summary: Improved bilattice documentation in 02-ConstitutiveFoundation.tex: added formal definitions of interlaced and distributive bilattices with Fitting1990 citation, created new LUB/GLB remark for lattice operations, and restructured non-interlacing remark with counterexample model M_D and intuitive explanation.

Implementation summary with changes and verification results
